title: league error 0xc0000005 LEAGUE WONT LAUNCH 2017
body: Hi my league won't load and i really need to get playing again it it shows this message when i click launch ,error 0xc0000005 anyone help me?

replies.body:
This is a fairly common error that pops up if you're running AVG and it's mistakenly blocking an application. You may be able to resolve this by updating your AVG definitions then follow [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) to add exceptions for League into AVG. If those steps didn't fix it, you'll need to disable AVG or uninstall it completely to run League.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hello, Targons Blade
What do I have to do exactly to fix this error if I'm not using AVG (I'm using avast)? I tried adding the launchers to exclusions but that didn't work as well.
- Hiradaira
